title: A glimpse of Sions glory, or, The churches beautie specified published for the good and benefit of all those whose hearts are raised up in the expectation of the glorious liberties of the saints.
author: Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.
notes: Entered in Wing under Hanserd Knollys.
Attributed also to William Kiffin, Jeremiah Burroughs and Jose Glover by various sources.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
